ai-iti70:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti70:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I’ve seen beings who engaged in misconduct by body, speech, and mind, who abused the noble ones, who had wrong views and acted accordingly.
ai-iti70:2.2_0: They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-iti70:3.1_0: Now, I don’t say this because I’ve heard it from some other ascetic or brahmin.
ai-iti70:3.2_0: I’ve seen beings who engaged in misconduct by body, speech, and mind, who abused the noble ones, who had wrong views and acted accordingly.
ai-iti70:3.3_0: They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-iti70:3.4_0: Rather, I say it because I’ve known, seen, and realized it for myself.
ai-iti70:4.1_0: I’ve seen beings who engaged in misconduct by body, speech, and mind, who abused the noble ones, who had wrong views and acted accordingly.
ai-iti70:4.2_0: They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.”
ai-iti70:5.3_0: and right bodily deeds have been done,
ai-iti70:5.4_0: for a person here who does the body.
ai-iti70:7.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
ai-iti70:7.2_0: First the first part of the body.
